Description: Upper section of a green glazed composition shabti of Sety 1.
Findspot: Found/Acquired: Tomb of Sety I, KV17 (by inference)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2017-2018 10 Oct-14 April, Sir John Soane’s Museum, London, The Great Belzoni: Egyptology’s Pioneer
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Somerset Lowry-Corry, 2nd Earl of Belmore
